title: Development of University-Level Learning Assessment Framework: Qualitative Research-Based Application to Language Domains

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: A learning space enabling team-based collaboration and individual reflective activities in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish and explain three or more core characteristics of university-level language learning.
Learners can develop language proficiency assessment criteria using qualitative research methods.
Learners can design assessment tools by applying a knowledge relationship analysis framework
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
